dict.string:
DiDa Memos
Version 1.2.0 ✯ New Calendars UI ✯ Search memos from the top bar ✯ Set time stamp at your own convenience
Version 1.1.2 ✯ Specified an Application's settings.
Version 1.1.1 ✯ UI optimized ︎✦ Corrected an error for location information ︎✦ Fixed issue with passcode-lock stops recording
Version 1.1.0 ✯ passcode and Touch ID used for user authentication
Version 1.0.4 ✯ optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
Version 1.0.3 ︎✦ adjust UI layout for iOS 6.x
Version 1.0.2 ︎✦ Fixed issue with time labels are not aligned ✯ optimized for iphone 5s arm64
Version 1.0.1 ︎✦ Fixed time labels not be displayed correctly on horizontal slider ︎✦ Fixed bug: record blocking after playing a voice memo
Version 1.0.0 ✯ Initial release
